Package com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observable
    Observable.
    Observer
    Observer.
    TaskKiller
    This interface should be implemented to allow components to request the killing of Mesos Tasks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChainedObserver
    Both an Observer and Observable.
    DefaultObservable
    Implementation of the Observable interface.
    DefaultScheduler
    This scheduler when provided with a ServiceSpec will deploy the service and recover from encountered faults when possible.
    DefaultScheduler.Builder
    Builder class for DefaultSchedulers.
    DefaultTaskKiller
    This class is a default implementation of the TaskKiller interface.
    SchedulerDriverFactory
    Factory class for creating MesosSchedulerDrivers.
    SchedulerUtils
    This class provides utilities common to the construction and operation of Mesos Schedulers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SchedulerErrorCode
    This enum provides exit codes for Schedulers.
